Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{3: 'The Scarab squad transport aircraft departs from Babylonia and enters automatic cruise mode.'}
{3: 'Valeria leaves the pilot seat and walks steadily toward the back of the cabin.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Let me go over the mission brief.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The Red Tide is gathering at an artificial island. Two squads have gone missing there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'We might have to deal with the missing squads on top of the Hetero-Creatures there.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Ground combat, the Red Tide... Why isn't this mission assigned to a proper Task Force squad... like the Gray Ravens?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The Gray Ravens are still helping Lucia with her frame replacement, but more importantly...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "We've been chosen primarily because one of us is familiar with the mission location.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Valeria rarely asks questions. In other words, she's the type to pack everything she wants to say into statements."}
{3: 'And right now, this means...'}
{1: '1', 3: "Yata feels Valeria's gaze turn toward her."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hydrangea Island. This is where I went to high school.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I know my way around there. I can be your guide, assuming there are still paths to follow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "The island was abandoned following the Punishing outbreak. I'm one of the few survivors.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "As for the details, I'm sure the Commander's intel is more comprehensive than what I know.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeming to have noticed her own emotions, she adds these explanations before closing her eyes.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Well then, let's continue.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Weather satellites have captured continuous movement patterns during the night...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After this brief interlude, Valeria resumes explaining the mission details.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Discord reviews the mission's details on her terminal as she listens to Valeria talking, while Shiva reclines in her seat, resting with her eyes closed."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yata props her cheek up, twirling her hair with her right index finger as her gaze drifts out the window.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{3: "At some point, Earth's silhouette gradually fills her entire view, followed by patches of clouds..."}
{3: "The approaching blue planet stirs indescribable ripples in Yata's heart."}
{3: 'Certain memories, intentionally locked away, now force their way into her mind...'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: "That blue sky is as much like a spider's web as it is an endless midsummer.", 3: '60'}
{3: "That blue sky is as much like a spider's web as it is an endless midsummer."}
{1: 'No one can truly escape.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'No one can truly escape.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Such a deep blue sky, not a cloud in sight.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: "It's rare to have such nice weather on the first day of school. Why don't you take this chance to look around?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "This is so annoying. I've never seen such a stuffy old school.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Haha, keep your voice down, Yata.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'See, your student handbook proudly states...', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: '"Misono Academy High School is a private institution renowned for its strict discipline."', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: '"We cultivate elite individuals who possess both academic excellence and noble character."', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'The school motto is "explore the vast universe, strive for human perfection."', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'How very...', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: "It's less about outdated aesthetics and more about deliberately projecting an air of superiority.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'What kind of superiority?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Hmm... The arrogance of the elite class?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Anyhow, this is the best high school there is on the island.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Your old man had to call in favors from several friends for recommendation letters just to get you enrolled here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: '...Why should I care? You never asked for my opinion before moving to the island.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yata's Father", 3: 'Sorry, sorry, my bad again. Haha.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Back then, I followed my father to this school, on a day without a cloud in sight.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Back then, I followed my father to this school, on a day without a cloud in sight.'}
{1: 'Directionless in life, I drifted aimlessly through my youth.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Directionless in life, I drifted aimlessly through my youth.'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{3: 'I gazed at the short school gate built with precious stones, and the emblem emblazoned in gold letters...'}
{3: 'I failed to sense the elitist arrogance my father had warned me about.'}
{3: 'Instead, I sensed a kind of fear—a fear that made everyone tread carefully.'}
{3: 'Rotting petals littered the ground as harsh sunlight bore down mercilessly.'}
{3: "Soon, sweat soaked through my uniform's lining. I undid a button, but the heat remained unbearable."}
{3: 'Seeking shelter from the sun, I weaved through the crowd of new students and their parents.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Under a tree by the school gate stood a fair-skinned girl.'}
{3: 'Our eyes met by chance. She stood motionless like a doll, her brows furrowed.'}
{3: 'Thinking she might need help, I walked over to her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hello there. Are you waiting for someone?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hmm... Yes? Can I help you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Oh, I'm Yata. I'm a first-year student, too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'May I know your name?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "The transport's roar pulls Yata back to the cramped cabin."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Oh uh... I'm listening.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Besides investigating the Red Tide and locating the missing squads, we have another objective—capture the target alive if possible.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Who's the target?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "A scientist from the Golden Age. I've sent the details to your terminals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The transport is about to reach the designated altitude. Everyone get ready.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'I have a bad feeling about this...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even after all these years, Yata still kicks herself for what happened that day.'}
{3: 'She regrets being so lost in memories that she failed to stop Shiva from speaking.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep—'}
{3: 'Harsh red warning lights suddenly flood the cabin.'}
{3: 'Urgent alarms and an automated voice message follow suit.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{1: '[WARNING! HIGH-SPEED HEAT SIGNATURE DETECTED!]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[WARNING! HIGH-SPEED HEAT SIGNATURE DETECTED!]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'RWR response?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Shiva rushes to the pilot seat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "What's wrong? Is this some sort of malfunction?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "It's a radar warning.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Surface-to-air missile detected three o'clock under, moving at high speed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Shiva rapidly works the control panel, Discord moves in for a closer look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Can we make it? Should we try electromagnetic interference?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'ECM system deployed, calculating evasive trajectory.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Wait, the attack source has an IFF signature with a no-lock indicator...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "...It's friendly fire.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "The incoming missiles are from... Babylonia's surface-to-air defense system.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Verify IFF protocol.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "It's been terminated unilaterally!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Two seconds!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Deploy chaff and ECM!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'No time! Everyone, hold on tight!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "As a blinding flash erupts from the left wing, Yata forces Discord's head down."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: 'A tremendous impact rocks the small cabin, sending violent shockwaves coursing through its walls.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "In the explosion's wake, black smoke and the acrid stench of burning seep into the cabin."}
{1: '1', 3: "Yata reaches out with a mechanical arm and catches Valeria who's been flung to the other side of the cabin."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Piercing alarms blare through the cabin. The danger is far from over...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{1: '[ENGINE THRUST CRITICAL]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[ENGINE THRUST CRITICAL]'}
{1: '[FUEL TANK BREACH]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[FUEL TANK BREACH]'}
{1: '[FUSELAGE FIRE]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[FUSELAGE FIRE]'}
{1: '[RADAR MALFUNCTION]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[RADAR MALFUNCTION]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shiva, give me a status report.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'We lost one engine completely, and the other appears to be compromised as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'The left wing is barely responding to controls, and the autopilot system is practically non-functional.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "Worst of all, we're dealing with a fuel tank breach. We're already below the safety threshold...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Shiva, I'm authorizing an IFF protocol override. Launch two air-to-ground missiles at the source of attack.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'IFF protocol disengaged. Anti-radiation missiles locked onto source of attack.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "It's no use, the bomb bay is jammed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Yata, activate emergency protocol and prepare for equipment airdrop to reduce weight.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Copy that, tracking beacon connected to the terminal.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep—'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{1: '[WARNING! HIGH-SPEED HEAT SIGNATURE DETECTED!]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[WARNING! HIGH-SPEED HEAT SIGNATURE DETECTED!]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "You've got to be kidding—another one?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "High-speed SAM, three o'clock under!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'AI module malfunction, unable to calculate evasive maneuvers.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shiva, take control of the aircraft.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'You are authorized to perform high-risk evasive maneuvers.', 4: '1'}
{1: '[AUTO-CRUISE DISENGAGED]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[AUTO-CRUISE DISENGAGED]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Everyone, hold on tight—we're diving!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "Shiva pushes the control stick forward to its limit, causing the aircraft's nose to pitch downward."}
{3: 'In that instant, Yata spots a glint of light in the distant clouds.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Shiva! More to the left!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shiva responds by forcefully banking the transport aircraft to the left.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The sharp evasive maneuver causes something to break loose from the wing.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'As trails of fire mark the path of the deployed flares, another violent explosion erupts nearby.'}
{3: 'The cabin shudders slightly, but this time, everyone stays firmly in their seats.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Did we dodge it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Not completely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Something on the underside of the transport aircraft must have been hit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "At least it wasn't the bomb bay. I consider ourselves very lucky, all things considered.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'How much fuel do we have left?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Can't tell. The instruments are dead.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "Abort return mission. We'll make an emergency landing on Hydrangea Island.", 4: '1'}
{1: '[EXCESSIVE SPEED]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[EXCESSIVE SPEED]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Is the map navigation system still working?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "We're at optimal altitude for shoulder-mounted missiles. We need to act fast.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Hydrangea Island's outline is in view, but we can't confirm the terrain. No data in the database.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Switching to visual guidance. Initial assessment shows three potential landing zones.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'For the highest chance of success, the central inland area would be our best bet.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "The bay area might be contaminated by the Red Tide. We'll land in the central inland area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Brace for impact.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "There's so much vegetation... Even the spaces between buildings are filled with tall trees.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "This is annoying. Can't even see where the ground is through all this.", 4: '1'}
{1: '[PROXIMITY WARNING]', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '[PROXIMITY WARNING]'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory99.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory99.png'}
{3: "The transport aircraft's last remaining engine fires diagonally forward, attempting to slow itself down as it skims the ground."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory295.png'}
{3: "After breaking through countless trees, the transport craft's tail makes contact with the ground."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory767.png'}
{3: 'A massive, muffled explosion follows, as flames rise from the clearing near the forest.'}
{3: 'As smoke billows into the sky, Hydrangea Island falls silent once more.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, inside the now-wrecked industrial transport ship...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shiva, deploy the drones. Yata, check if the mounted weapons are still operational.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Two recon drones are still functional. Deploying them now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Here's your pulse gun.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valeria takes the pulse gun from Yata and inspects its energy storage unit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Signal lost from both drones.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Watch out! Enemies nearby!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Just as Yata reaches for the mangled cabin door...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'A powerful electromagnetic pulse strikes from nowhere, forcing her to her knees before she can react.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Dammit, what the hell is this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "Valeria swiftly establishes a consciousness link to stabilize Yata and Discord's M.I.N.D."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "Something's wrong. It's a malicious interference targeting the M.I.N.D.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Are there other commandants on the island, or perhaps...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Radar's picking up infected mechanoids at nine o'clock.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Is it one or multiple?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Should be just one... Wait...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "Suspicious signals detected at three o'clock, six o'clock, and eight o'clock.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "We can't stay in the transport craft any longer. We need to fight our way out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shiva, sync the map data from both drones to our terminals.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Only 12% of environmental data has been collected within range of the transport.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Clear enemy signatures detected behind the trees on the left flank.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Yata, prepare to breach.', 4: '1'}
